content.webTitle: Tell us: how has coronavirus affected small businesses in the UK?

fields.headline: Tell us: how has coronavirus affected small businesses in the UK?
fields.bodyText: According to a study from King’s Business School, around 6m UK small businesses are in a ‘precarious position’ financially due to the coronavirus pandemic. We want to hear from small and medium enterprises in the UK about how they have been affected by the outbreak. Share your experiences You can get in touch by filling in the form below or via WhatsApp by clicking here or adding the contact +44(0)7867825056. Only the Guardian will see your responses and one of our journalists may be in touch for more information. If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
